show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

header.title: Meanings of Our Lady of Guadalupe

title: Meanings of Our Lady of Guadalupe
content: Meanings of Our Lady of Guadalupe — the season of Advent; the Virgin Mary’s syncretic blendings; Pussy Riot’s... <!--more--> imprisonment after singing their Marian prayer as part of the anti-Putin movement in Russia; a conversation about Our Lady of Guadalupe with Ana Castillo, editor of the anthology Goddess of the Americas (anacastillo.com); a recording of Pussy Riot’s prayer to Mary; poem by Patricia Monaghan
